name: Duality (itch) (Niels Lanting)
description:
This game was made for the Global Game Jam 2022. We explore the duality between light and dark.

This game was made in 48 hours and contains a total of 3 playable levels.

Developers:

  • Lennard Sprong
  • Niels Lanting

Assets used:

  • https://kenney.nl/assets/bit-platformer-pack
  • https://opengameart.org/content/story-song
  • https://raou.itch.io/free-dungeon-mini-tileset
